title: VEO 3 - BILAN Serve/Mix/Drink - First & Last Frame Prompts
overall_style: photorealistic, minimalist modern aesthetic, bright natural lighting, clean kitchen environment, white and neutral accent colors

section_1_serve.description: Opening a fresh BILAN electrolyte pouch and measuring the powder

first_frame.frame_description: A pristine BILAN electrolyte pouch rests on a clean white marble countertop. The pouch is sealed, featuring clean BILAN branding. To the right sits a clear glass sports bottle (empty), and a metallic measuring spoon. Soft morning light streams from the left, creating subtle shadows. The composition is balanced, centered on the pouch. Everything is still and untouched.
key_elements: Sealed BILAN electrolyte pouch (branding visible)
Empty transparent sports bottle with white cap
Metallic measuring spoon (3g capacity)
White marble countertop with subtle gray veining
Soft natural lighting from window left side
Minimalist kitchen background (slightly out of focus)
No motion - completely still frame
first_frame.camera: Wide macro shot, slightly elevated angle (30 degrees), centered composition
first_frame.lighting: Bright natural window light from left, soft shadows to the right, no harsh contrasts
first_frame.color_palette: whites, light grays, stainless steel, clean neutral tones

last_frame.frame_description: The BILAN electrolyte pouch is now open, tilted at 45 degrees, with fine white powder being spooned out. The measuring spoon is mid-scoop inside the pouch, capturing exactly 3g of powder. A small mound of powder is visible on the spoon. The sports bottle remains in the same position but now the cap is removed and placed beside it. The lighting is identical, maintaining continuity.
key_elements: Open BILAN electrolyte pouch tilted 45 degrees
Measuring spoon inside pouch with mounded powder
Fine white electrolyte powder texture visible
Sports bottle cap now removed and placed on counter
Same marble countertop and background
Identical lighting and shadows
Sense of action paused mid-motion
last_frame.camera: Same wide macro shot, same angle, same framing - only elements have moved
last_frame.lighting: Identical to first frame - bright natural window light from left
last_frame.color_palette: Same as first frame with bright white powder visible

section_2_mix.description: Adding water and shaking the bottle to create the electrolyte drink

first_frame.frame_description: Close-up macro shot of the clear sports bottle with 3g of white BILAN electrolyte powder settled at the bottom. The bottle is upright and stationary on the white marble counter. A glass pitcher of crystal-clear water is positioned to the left, ready to pour. The powder sits in a small concentrated pile at the bottle's base. Everything is still. The background shows the same minimalist kitchen, slightly blurred.
key_elements: Clear sports bottle with small pile of white powder at bottom
Powder completely dry and settled
Glass pitcher filled with clear water (left side)
White marble counter surface
Bottle is perfectly upright and still
Natural bright lighting from window
No liquid in bottle yet
Clean, pristine aesthetic
first_frame.camera: Tight macro shot, eye-level with bottle, centered on bottle base where powder sits
first_frame.lighting: Bright natural light, slight backlight through water pitcher showing crystal clarity
first_frame.color_palette: crystal clear transparency, white powder, white marble, silver bottle cap

last_frame.frame_description: The same bottle, now completely filled with clear electrolyte solution, is captured mid-shake in motion blur. The bottle is tilted at approximately 60 degrees, held by a hand (only fingers visible at edge of frame). The liquid inside shows a perfect swirling vortex with tiny bubbles throughout. The solution is crystal clear and translucent. Water droplets glisten on the outside of the bottle. The marble counter is the same, the pitcher has moved back slightly. Sense of dynamic motion.
key_elements: Sports bottle tilted 60 degrees mid-shake
Fingers visible gripping bottle at frame edge
Uniform crystal clear electrolyte solution filling bottle
Swirling vortex pattern inside liquid
Micro-bubbles throughout the solution
Water droplets on exterior of bottle
Slight motion blur on bottle (showing shake action)
Pitcher moved back, out of focus
Dynamic energy captured
last_frame.camera: Same macro framing but bottle now angled, slight motion blur on moving elements
last_frame.lighting: Same natural bright light, now refracting through the clear liquid creating soft glow
last_frame.color_palette: Crystal clear translucent liquid, white marble, water droplet highlights

section_3_drink.description: Taking a refreshing drink from the prepared electrolyte beverage

first_frame.frame_description: Medium shot of a person's torso and hand reaching toward the BILAN electrolyte bottle on the marble counter. The bottle is filled with the clear electrolyte drink, cap removed, standing upright. The person's hand is extended toward the bottle but not yet touching it. They're wearing a light gray athletic shirt. The kitchen background shows morning light through sheer curtains. Composition shows anticipation of the action.
key_elements: Sports bottle filled with clear BILAN electrolyte drink
Bottle upright on marble counter, cap off
Person's hand reaching toward bottle (not touching yet)
Light gray athletic clothing visible
Person's face partially visible but out of focus
Morning light through curtains in background
Clean, healthy, active lifestyle aesthetic
Moment of anticipation before drinking
first_frame.camera: Medium shot, slightly angled (20 degrees from straight-on), bottle in lower third of frame
first_frame.lighting: Soft bright natural morning light, gentle and inviting
first_frame.color_palette: crystal clear drink, light gray athletic wear, white/cream tones, soft natural colors

last_frame.frame_description: Close-up shot of the same person mid-drink. The bottle is tilted up at 45 degrees, pressed to their lips, with the clear liquid visible inside as the level has dropped slightly. Their eyes are closed in a moment of refreshment and satisfaction. A subtle smile is visible at the corner of their mouth. Natural light illuminates their face from the side, creating a healthy glow. The background is the same but more blurred, focusing attention on the moment of hydration. Droplets of condensation visible on the bottle exterior.
key_elements: Person drinking from bottle, eyes closed contentedly
Bottle tilted 45 degrees pressed to lips
Liquid level visibly lower in bottle
Subtle smile of satisfaction
Side-lighting creating healthy glow on face
Condensation droplets on bottle
Expression of refreshment and relief
Background heavily blurred (shallow depth of field)
Feeling of satisfaction and replenishment
last_frame.camera: Closer medium-close shot, slight upward angle emphasizing the refreshment moment
last_frame.lighting: Beautiful natural side-light on face, soft and flattering, evoking health and vitality
last_frame.color_palette: warm skin tones, crystal clear drink, soft grays, natural light highlights

technical_notes: Maintain consistent lighting and environment across all sections for cohesion
The BILAN electrolyte powder should be pure white - clean and natural
First frames are all completely still - no motion blur
Last frames show captured moments of action - slight motion blur acceptable
Camera position changes between sections but stays consistent within each section
Same marble counter and kitchen environment throughout for brand consistency
No text overlays - clean product focus
VEO 3 will interpolate the motion between first and last frames

color_grading_notes.saturation: Natural, slightly desaturated for premium feel
color_grading_notes.white_tones: Pure, clean white powder - not artificial looking

continuity_checklist: Same marble counter in all sections
Same kitchen background and window light direction
Same sports bottle design and size
Same person in drink section as hand in mix section
BILAN branding visible but not overpowering
